abstract: Home Depot said on Tuesday that it was lowering the price of its wholesale supply unit business by nearly $2 billion, confirming media reports. As previously reported, the retailer will sell HD Supply to a consortium of private equity firms for $8.5 billion, while holding onto a 12.5 percent stake in the unit and backing $1 billion in financing.
lead_paragraph: Home Depot said on Tuesday that it was lowering the price of its wholesale supply unit business by nearly $2 billion, confirming media reports. As previously reported, the retailer will sell HD Supply to a consortium of private equity firms for $8.5 billion, while holding onto a 12.5 percent stake in the unit and backing $1 billion in financing.

headline.main: Home Depot Confirms New Price for Supply Unit
